plot: An uplifting story about compassion for less fortunate souls. A tender, heartwarming drama about a friendship between a little girl and a forgotten old lady. The story takes place in a working class neighborhood of New York City.
title: An Angel Is Born
plot_es: An uplifting story about compassion for less fortunate souls. A tender, heartwarming drama about a friendship between a little girl and a forgotten old lady. The story takes place in a working class neighborhood of New York City.
